ComicInfo.Title: Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: Blood Legacy: The Story of Ryan
ComicInfo.Summary: Ryan's mesmerizing story continues to unfold as Dr. Susan Ryerson learns more and more about her mysterious patient. Plus, visions of the Battle of Agincourt haunt the geneticist so vividly that they seem real. But, Susan grows more unsettled when Ryan begins to tell her of the others, the elegant, beautiful and violent creatures who are Ryan's kind. Susan comes to realize with fear that Ryan may be running from more than just her past.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 19:03:45. [CVDB152027]
ComicInfo.Inker: Eric Basaldua, Jaime Mendoza, Marlo Alquiza, Richard Bonk, Rick Ketcham, Rob Hunter, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett Evans, Edwin Rosell, Mark Pajarillo
ComicInfo.Characters: Abigail, Edward, Marilyn de Fontesque, Ryan, Susan Ryerson, Victor Alexander
